posts.post_content:
I have the following T Cards for sale. Price includes shipping via USPS with tracking. If you have any questions let me know. Scans are included. Payment can be made via Paypal. Thanks, Tom S.

T213 Coupon, Admiral Schlei, SGC 10, Sold Thanks Jeremy
T213 Coupon, Mickey Doolan, SGC 10, $35.00
T212 Obak, Martinke, SGC 30, $30.00
T211 Red Sun, Perdue, SGC 10, Sold Thanks Mike
T206, Doughtery, El Princ. De Gales, PSA 1, $60.00
T205 Joe Tinker, BVG 3.5, 110.00

Personal Checks and money orders are ok if you prefer over Paypal. Please contact me for my mailing information.

Thanks,

Tom Swift
